name: Gun Firing Range: Shooting Simulator 3D
description:
Show some sharpshooter skills and strike down multiple targets in the shooting range practice. Gun firing range brings you the realistic shooting range experience with challenging targets to strike. To unlock multiple rifles you need to accomplish missions. Gain points and then you can choose from the guns with more fire power. Shoot the static and moving targets in limited time to test your shooting skills. Target includes bottles and target rings.

Game Play

-          Select the sniper or assault rifles from the arm stock.
-          Recommended rifles are more suitable for striking targets in different missions.
-          Shoot different static and moving targets in limited time to accomplish missions.
-          Gain bonus points and unlock expert’s rifles to shoot with more efficiency.
-          Select wisely between sniper and assault rifles for different missions.


Play gun firing range and have most thrilling and addictive full of action gaming experience in 12 missions. Shoot the targets in the realistic forest environment and master your shooting skills. Hold your breath and target with precision to strike the bottles and target rings with one push on trigger and become a pro shooter.
